original_text: Those who were standing near Paul said, “How dare you insult God’s high priest!”
korean_text: 곁에 선 사람들이 말하되 하나님의 대제사장을 네가 욕하느냐

sentences.original_text: Those who were standing near Paul said
sentences.korean_translation: 바울 곁에 서 있던 사람들이 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: "How dare you insult God's high priest!"
